description: This file appears to be a build recipe or configuration script for OpenSSL 0.9, used within a build system like Yocto. It contains metadata, dependencies, build instructions, and configuration steps rather than source code for an application or library.

methods.name: do_configure
methods.description: Configures the build environment for OpenSSL, setting target-specific options and executing configuration scripts.

methods.name: do_compile
methods.description: Runs the make process to compile the source code.

methods.name: do_install
methods.description: Installs the compiled binaries and libraries into the designated directories.
